column5:
おまえに　白ジシの胴を　さずけよう！\n
全ての　悪から　身を守る\n
最強の胴じゃ！
column6: I bestow upon each of you the White Lion Armor, the strongest protection against evil!

column5:
ジパングの未来は\n
おまえたちに　かかっておる！\n
行け！　火の勇者よ！！
column6:
The future of Jipang is in your hands!\n
Go forth, Fire Heroes!

column5: 神獣白ジシの　封印を　解き放った
column6: You have broken the seal of the divine beast White Lion.

column5: 白ジシの胴を　手に入れた！！
column6: Obtained White Lion Armor!

column5:
ジパングの未来は\n
おまえたちに　かかっておる！\n
行け！　火の勇者よ！！
column6:
The future of Jipang is in your hands!\n
Go forth, Fire Heroes!

column5:
わたしは　神獣　白トラ！\n
悪霊と　戦う　神獣たちの\n
いくさの　大将だ！
column6: I am the White Tiger, warchief of the divine beasts in our battle against evil spirits!

column5:
ジライアよ！　大門教１３人衆の中には\n
水王丸　幻王丸という\n
兄弟が　いる
column6: Listen, Ziria! There are two brothers among the Thirteen Daimon Cultists you must be wary of.

column5:
この　二人は　１３人衆の中でも\n
おそろしく　強い！\n
鬼神も　ふるえる　強さだ！
column6: Their names are Suioumaru and Genoumaru. Even a demon from Hell would tremble before them!

column5:
わたしたち　二人の　神獣も\n
マサカドの　妖気を　宿した\n
やつら兄弟に　敗れたのだ！
column6: Masakado's energy flows within their bodies. For that reason, the two of us were easily overwhelmed!

column5:
今の　おまえたちでは\n
勝ち目が　ないかもしれない\n
だが　さけることは　できぬ！！
column6: As things stand, it is unlikely that you can defeat them. Even so, you cannot avoid this confrontation!

column5:
火の勇者として　大門教と　戦う限り\n
水王丸　幻王丸と\n
顔を　会わせる日も　近いだろう
column6: As you continue fighting the Cult of Daimon, coming face to face with them is only a matter of time.

column5:
気を　ひきしめて　行くがよい！\n
さあ　一切の　魔しょうを　うち滅ぼす\n
三つの　武器を　さずけよう
column6:
Grit your teeth and soldier on!\n
I bestow upon you three weapons with which to destroy all evil.

column5:
ジパングの　未来は\n
おまえたちに　かかっている！！\n
行け！　火の勇者たちよ！
column6: We entrust the future of Jipang to you! Go forth, Fire Heroes!

column5: 神獣白トラの　封印を　解き放った
column6: You have broken the seal of the divine beast White Tiger.

column5: 白虎の剣を　手に入れた！！
column6: Obtained White Tiger Sword!

column5: 白虎の弓を　手に入れた！
column6: Obtained White Tiger Bow!

column5: 白虎のオノを　手に入れた！！
column6: Obtained White Tiger Axe!

column5:
ジパングの　未来は\n
おまえたちに　かかっている！！\n
行け！　火の勇者たちよ！
column6: We entrust the future of Jipang to you! Go forth, Fire Heroes!

column5:
やっと　来ていただけましたか\n
火の勇者さま！！
column6: Thank you for coming, Fire Hero!

column5:
わが神社の　白ジシさまと\n
白トラさまを　一刻も早く\n
お救いくだされ！！
column6: Hurry! You must rescue our sacred White Lion and White Tiger!

column5:
さいきんは　大門教のために\n
行けなくなったけど　東のほうに\n
かくれ湯が　あるのよ！
column6: I haven't been there in a while, what with the Daimonists and all, but there's a hidden hot spring east from here!

column5:
近くに　大きな滝が　あったわ！\n
たしか　ようろうの滝って　言ったっけ
column6:
There's a waterfall nearby, too!\n
I think it's called Yourou Falls.

column5:
くるり城の　水王丸が\n
この神社を　おそってきて
column6: Suioumaru of Kururi Castle attacked our village.

column5:
白ジシさまと　白トラさまを\n
石に　してしまったのです\n
水王丸は　おそろしいやつです
column6: He turned our beloved White Lion and White Tiger to stone...He's so evil.

column5:
ちば国の　大門教本部は\n
くるり城に　あるんだ
column6: Kururi Castle is the main Daimonist base here in Chiba.

column5:
男たちは　大門教に　北の　くるり城へ\n
連れて　いかれたわ\n
助けてください　火の勇者さま！！
column6:
The Cult of Daimon took the men of our village north, to Kururi Castle.\n
Please save them, Fire Hero!

column5:
千葉国の大門教は\n
水王丸って　男が\n
とりしきっているんだよ
column6: The Daimonists in Chiba are led by a man called Suioumaru.

column5:
うえーん　うえーん\n
とうちゃんが　カラクリ兵に\n
連れて　行かれたよー！！！
column6:
Bwaaah! Sob...\n
My dad was taken away by the clockwork soldiers!

column5:
うえーん　うえーん\n
おにいちゃん！\n
とうちゃんを　助けてよー
column6:
Sob...Sob...\n
Mister! Please save my dad!

column5:
白ジシさまと　白トラさまは\n
神獣の中でも　もっとも\n
いくさに　たけた　かたがたじゃ
column6: The sacred White Lion and White Tiger are the strongest warriors among the divine beasts.

column5:
その　お二人を\n
赤子の手を　ひねるがごとく\n
あっさり　ねじ伏せてしまうとは！
column6: And yet they were so easily defeated...

column5:
大門教は・・・\n
マサカドは・・・\n
どこまで　強いんじゃ！！
column6:
The Cult of Daimon, Masakado...\n
Is there no limit to their power?!

column5: 宿屋
column6: Inn

column5:
大門教が　くるり城に　男たちを\n
連れて　行ったのは　工場で\n
はたらかせる　ためですよ　きっと！
column6: Those Daimonists brought the men to Kururi Castle to work at their factory, no doubt about it!

column5:
いらっしゃいませ！\n
ここは　宿屋でございます
column6: Welcome to the inn!

column5:
ひと晩　８０両でございますが\n
おとまりになりますか？
column6:
It's 両80 for the night.\n
Will you stay?

column5:
いらっしゃいませ！\n
ここは　宿屋でございます
column6: Welcome to the inn!

column5:
ひと晩　８０両でございますが\n
おとまりになりますか？
column6:
It's 両80 for the night.\n
Will you stay?

column5:
お客さま！\n
お金が　あるときに\n
また　おこしください！
column6:
Good sir!\n
Please come back when you have enough money!

column5:
それでは　\n
ごゆっくり　お休みください
column6: Please rest well.

column5: また　おこしください
column6: Please come again.

column5:
いってらっしゃいませ！\n
お気をつけて　ジライアさま
column6: Take care of yourself, Ziria-sama.

column5:
いらっしゃいませ！\n
きろく　しますか？\n
いえいえ　お金はいりません
column6:
Good day! Would you like me to keep a record of your progress?\n
No need to pay -- it's free!

column5: それでは　きろく　します
column6: Let me write this down.

column5: また　お気軽に　どうぞ！
column6: Come back anytime!

column5:
ここは　温泉やど！！\n
今どき　なんと　タダ！！\n
泊らないとソン！！　泊まる？！
column6:
This is a hot spring inn! It's completely free! You should stay for a while!\n
How about it?

column5: また　おいで！！
column6: Come back!

column5: ごゆっくり！！
column6: Rest well!

column5: 茶店
column6: Tea House

column5:
いらっしゃいませー！\n
ここは　茶店でーす！！\n
ごようは　なあに？
column6:
Welcome to my tea house!\n
How may I help you?

column5: ありがとうございました
column6: You have our gratitude.

column5: それじゃ　また　きてねー
column6: Come back anytime!

column5:
ようろうの滝？\n
大きな滝だよな？\n
温泉も　あるよな？
column6: Yourou Falls? You mean that big waterfall? With the hot spring?

column5:
東のほうだよな？\n
ヘンな外人が　言ってた所だろ？\n
よーく　しってるだろ！
column6:
The one to the east? The place mentioned by that funny foreigner?\n
Of course I know about it!

column5:
でも　場所は　知らないんだよな\n
ごめんな
column6:
But I don't know where it is.\n
Sorry.

column5: 神社
column6: Shrine

column5:
大門教が　乗り込んできて\n
あっと　いうまに　白ジシさまを\n
石に　してしまいました
column6: Daimonists suddenly attacked us and turned our beloved White Lion to stone.

column5:
白ジシさまは　火の勇者が　身につける\n
最強の防具を　お守りに　なっています\n
はやく　白ジシさまの元へ！！
column6:
He is the keeper of the ultimate defensive equipment made for the Fire Heroes.\n
You must rescue him, quick!

column5:
火の一族の　勇者さま\n
ありがとうございました\n
かならずや　この国を　お救いください
column6:
Thank you, hero of the Fire Clan.\n
May you save our beautiful Jipang!

column5: 神社
column6: Shrine

column5:
白トラさまが\n
水王丸の　手にかかり\n
石に　封印されて　しまいました
column6: The sacred White Tiger was turned to stone by Suioumaru!

column5:
白トラさまは　三人の　火の勇者が\n
お使いになる　三つの武器を\n
お持ちのはずです！
column6: He is the keeper of weapons made for the three Fire Heroes.

column5:
白トラさまの　封印を解き\n
三つの武器を　お受け取りください
column6: Please break the seal and receive these weapons from the sacred White Tiger!

column5:
まことに　ありがとう　ございました\n
いまや　マサカドの復活は　必至！\n
一刻も　早く　江戸へ！！！！
column6:
You have our gratitude.\n
I'm afraid Masakado's return is inevitable. You must hurry to Edo!

column5:
温泉が　わき出している\n
その　湯を　体に　浴びると\n
体力が　回復した
column6:
The pool is filled with hot spring water.\n
You feel reinvigorated as soon as you enter.

column5: ようろう滝
column6: Yourou Falls

column5:
ここが　ようろうの滝だ\n
温泉は　いい湯だったぜ\n
体力　満タンよ
column6: Welcome to Yourou Falls! The hot spring here is so great. Soak in its water and you'll be as good as new!

column5:
ようろうのタキには　温泉が\n
あるんですって・・・
column6: Wow, I had no idea there was a hot spring at Yourou Falls.

column5:
西に　行くと　シシトラ神社だよ！\n
白ジシさまと　白トラさまが\n
いるんだよ！
column6: Go west and you'll find Shishitora Shrine, home of the sacred White Lion and White Tiger!

column5:
北に　大門教の　くるり城が　ある\n
あんなとこ　行くんじゃないぞ！\n
カラクリ兵で　いっぱいじゃ！！
column6: Kururi Castle to the north belongs to the Cult of Daimon. You should stay away! It's full of clockwork soldiers!

column5:
ジライアさん\n
大門教打倒の日まで\n
がんばってください
column6: Never stop fighting the Cult of Daimon, Ziria-san.

column5:
だいぶ　まえに　ヘンな外人が\n
滝の中で　なにか　ゴソゴソ\n
やっておったぞ！　何しとったんじゃ！
column6:
A weird foreigner was rummaging behind the waterfall some time back.\n
What was he doing, I wonder?

column5: くるり町
column6: Kururi Town

column5:
ジライアさん\n
大門教打倒の日まで\n
がんばってください
column6: Never stop fighting the Cult of Daimon, Ziria-san.

column5:
マサカドの復活は　もうすぐです\n
お急ぎください\n
ジライアさん！！
column6:
Masakado's revival is imminent!\n
Make haste, Ziria-san!

column5:
この　くるりの町じゃ\n
男は　みんな　大門教に\n
とられて　しもうた！
column6: The Daimonists captured all of the men from our town!

column5:
みんな　城の中で\n
はたらかされとったよ
column6: They're forcing them to work inside the castle!

column5:
くるりの城は\n
大門教が　建てた　城じゃ！！
column6: Kururi Castle was built by the Cult of Daimon!

column5:
地下では　人殺しの\n
道具を　こさえとるちゅう　ウワサじゃ
column6: There's rumors that they're assembling tools of murder in its basement.

column5:
くるり城の　地下から\n
一日中　キカイの　音が\n
きこえるのじゃ
column6: All day long, we can hear the sound of machinery coming from Kururi Castle's basement.

column5:
男たちは　休みなく\n
はたらかされて　おるのじゃろう\n
なんとか　してやりたいのう！！
column6: They're forcing the men to work without rest...You have to do something!

column5:
城の地下で　はたらかされている\n
男たちの　気持ちも\n
くんでください！！
column6: Do you understand the plight of our men, toiling inside the castle?

column5:
自分の手で　作ったものが\n
人殺しに　使われることが\n
わかっていて　作り続けているのです
column6: They must keep working, knowing that the tools they create are used for evil!

column5:
城の地下で　作っとる\n
カラクリ兵は\n
江戸城へ　送っとるらしい
column6: The clockwork soldiers made in the castle's basement are being sent to Edo Castle.

column5:
ここから　むさし国へ　続いていた道は\n
大門教によって\n
ふさがれて　しまいました
column6: The way to the lands of Musashi has been closed off by the Cult of Daimon.

column5:
江戸へ　ぬけるには\n
ここの　大門教を\n
うちたおすしか　ありません！！
column6: To reach Edo, you must first defeat the Daimonists in Chiba!

column5:
北の　成田村の　さきに\n
ヤブシラズ　という\n
深い森が　ありますじゃ
column6: Keep going north, beyond Narita Village, and you'll find the Forbidden Forest.

column5:
この　くるりの城の　工場を\n
治めているのは　大門教１３人衆の\n
水王丸という　やつなんです！
column6: The man in charge of Kururi Castle's factory is Suioumaru, one of the Thirteen Daimon Cultists.

column5:
なんでも　邪神斎とかいう\n
大門教の　総大将の\n
ムスコの一人だ　そうです！！
column6: Did you know that he's one of the sons of Jashinsai, the leader of the Cult of Daimon?

column5:
この　くるりの城の　工場を\n
治めていたのは　大門教１３人衆の\n
水王丸という　やつです！
column6: The man in charge of Kururi Castle's factory was Suioumaru, one of the Thirteen Daimon Cultists.
column7: NOTE: almost the same message as F5425, but in past tense (presumably used after you beat him)

column5:
なんでも　邪神斎とかいう\n
大門教の　総大将の\n
ムスコの一人だ　そうです！！
column6: Did you know that he's one of the sons of Jashinsai, the leader of the Cult of Daimon?

column5: 宿屋
column6: Inn

column5:
東に　ようろうの滝が　あって\n
いい温泉が　わいてるぜ\n
行ったかい？
column6: There's a hot spring at Yourou Falls to the east. Have you ever been there?

column5:
いらっしゃいませ！\n
ここは　宿屋でございます
column6: Welcome to the inn!

column5:
ひと晩　８５両でございますが\n
おとまりになりますか？
column6:
It's 両85 for the night.\n
Will you stay?

column5:
いらっしゃいませ！\n
ここは　宿屋でございます
column6: Welcome to the inn!

column5:
ひと晩　８５両でございますが\n
おとまりになりますか？
column6:
It's 両85 for the night.\n
Will you stay?

column5:
お客さま！\n
お金が　あるときに\n
また　おこしください！
column6:
Good sir!\n
Please come back when you have enough money!

column5:
それでは　\n
ごゆっくり　お休みください
column6: Please rest well.

column5: また　おこしください
column6: Please come again.

column5:
いってらっしゃいませ！\n
お気をつけて　ジライアさま
column6: Take care of yourself, Ziria-sama.

column5:
いらっしゃいませ！\n
きろく　しますか？\n
いえいえ　お金はいりません
column6:
Good day! Would you like me to keep a record of your progress?\n
No need to pay -- it's free!

column5: それでは　きろく　します
column6: Let me write this down.

column5: また　お気軽に　どうぞ！
column6: Come back anytime!

column5:
ここは　温泉やど！！\n
今どき　なんと　タダ！！\n
泊らないとソン！！　泊まる？！
column6:
This is a hot spring inn! It's completely free! You should stay for a while!\n
How about it?

column5: また　おいで！！
column6: Come back!

column5: ごゆっくり！！
column6: Rest well!

column5: 武具屋
column6: Armory

column5:
いらっしゃいませ！\n
ここは　武具屋です\n
ご用件は　何ですか？
column6:
Welcome to my armory!\n
How can I help you?

column5: ありがとうございます
column6: Thank you very much.

column5: それでは　また　ご利用ください
column6: Come back anytime.

column5: よろず屋
column6: General Store

column5:
おいでやす\n
うちは　よろず屋でおます\n
ごようむきは　なんでっしゃろ？
column6:
Welcome, welcome!\n
This is my general store.\n
Tell me what you need!

column5:
おおきに\n
また　おこしやす
column6:
Thank you, thank you!\n
See you soon!

column5: また　おこしやす
column6: Have a nice day.

column5: 預かり所
column6: Warehouse

column5: 大門教会
column6: Daimon Church

column5:
大門教に　入会しないと\n
地下で　こきつかわれる\n
さあ　あんたも　祈りなさい！
column6:
Either you join the Cult of Daimon, or you work to death in the basement...\n
Better start praying.

column5:
さいだんは　神聖なる　ところ！\n
その　まわりで　ウロウロしては\n
バチが　あたりますぞ！！
column6: The altar is sacred! Do not loiter in front of it or you'll get punished!

column5: おかしな継ぎ目が・・・・
column6: You notice a suspicious gap between the bricks.
column7: NOTE: should probably have been in blue text

column5: あっ！
column6: Ah!

column5:
なんと　サイダンのしたから\n
階段が　現れました
column6: The altar opens up, revealing a staircase.

column5:
階段は普通のものですが\n
なぜ　こんなところに階段が\n
あるのでしょうか
column6: It appears to be an ordinary staircase...but what is it doing here?

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
中には　なにも　入っていなかった
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There is nothing inside.

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
木の弓が　入っていた
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There is a wooden bow inside.

column5: 木の弓を　手に入れた
column6: Obtained Wooden Bow.

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
白キジの尾が　入っていた
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There is a White Pheasant tail inside.

column5: 白キジの尾を　手に入れた
column6: Obtained White Pheasant Tail.

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
仙丹が　入っていた
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There is an elixir inside.

column5: 仙丹を　手に入れた
column6: Obtained Elixir.

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
金　５０００両が　入っていた
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There are 両5000 inside.

column5: 金　５０００両を　手に入れた
column6: Obtained 両5000.

column5: 地下工場
column6: Underground Factory

column5:
大門教に　入会しなかったから\n
ここに　連れてこられて\n
カラクリ兵を　作らされているんだよ
column6: They sent me here to make clockwork soldiers after I refused to join the Cult of Daimon...

column5:
おれは　いやだ！！\n
大門教の　ためになんか\n
はたらきたくない！！
column6:
I'm sick of this!\n
I don't want to work for them!

column5:
あんたも　大門教に\n
連れて　来られたのかい\n
かわいそうになあ　もうだめだ・・・
column6:
Were you kidnapped by the Daimonists, too? I know how you feel...\n
I can't take this anymore...

column5:
おれは　見たんだ\n
水王丸の　本当の姿は\n
イ　イ　イ　イカの　化け物なんだ
column6:
I...I saw it! Suioumaru's true form is...\n
a s-s-squid monster!

column5:
やつは　はたらけなくなった　人を\n
食っちまうんだあ！！\n
オラ　死にたくねえ！！
column6: If you don't work hard enough, he'll gobble you up! H-H-Help! I don't wanna die!

column5:
大門教は　カラクリ兵で\n
強力な　軍隊を　作って　大門教の力を\n
さらに　大きくするつもりだ！！
column6: The Cult of Daimon is creating a mighty army to further extend its reach!

column5:
ジライアさん！\n
あっしは　雲切の里の者です！\n
今　ここに　忍び込んでいます
column6:
Ziria-san! I'm from Kumogiri Hamlet.\n
I'm here undercover to look for intel.

column5:
江戸へ　持って行く\n
カラクリ兵は　工場の南から\n
運び出されます
column6: The clockwork soldiers are being transported to Edo from the southern side of the factory.

column5:
あそこからなら\n
江戸へ　行けるはずです！\n
急いでください！
column6:
That must be the way to Edo!\n
Please hurry!

column5:
水王丸が　ここの工場長なんです！\n
あいつさえ　いなくなれば\n
この工場は　止まります
column6: Suioumaru is the head of operations in this factory. Without him, production will stop.

column5:
ジライアさん　これ以上\n
カラクリ兵を　大門教に\n
作らせては　なりません！！
column6: Ziria-san! You can't let him create more clockwork soldiers for the Cult of Daimon!

column5:
カラクリ兵の　運び出し口は\n
水王丸が　がっちりと\n
守ってやがるんだ
column6: Suioumaru is guarding the pipe used to transport the clockwork soldiers.

column5:
うかつに　近づくと\n
ジライアさんといえども\n
あぶないですぜ！！
column6: You'll have to approach with care, Ziria-san!

column5: 武蔵国
column6: Musashi

column5:
ついに　ここまで　来たな　ジライア！\n
ここからは　大門教の本拠地だ！
column6:
We're finally here, Ziria.\n
The stronghold of the Cult of Daimon.

column5:
敵も　死にもの狂いで\n
向かってくるだろう！！\n
気を　ひきしめて　行かなくてはな！
column6:
They'll throw everything they have at us.\n
We must proceed with caution.

column5:
ゴクッ　きんちょー　するなあ！\n
でも　ジライア！　あたしたち三人が\n
いれば　ぜったいに　負けないよね
column6:
Whew...Talk about nerve-wracking!\n
But we got this, Ziria!\n
We just need to stick together!

column5:
ついに　マサカドの　眠る\n
江戸に　足を　ふみいれた
column6: At last, you step into Edo, where Masakado slumbers...

column5: 地下都市
column6: Underground City

column5:
鉄身丸がないと\n
ここは渡れないよ\n
でなおしておいで
column6:
You can't cross without an iron ball.\n
Go away.

column5:
反魂香がないと\n
ここは通さないよ\n
でなおしておいで
column6: You can't go through here without spiritual incense. Go away.

column5: うぎゃぁー！！
column6: AAARGH!

column5: 江ノ島
column6: Enoshima

column5: 雲切の里１５
column6: Kumogiri Hamlet 15

column5:
ジライアさま！！\n
わたしたちは　あなたさまが\n
この　むさし国に　おいでになるのを
column6: Ziria-sama!

column5:
一日千秋の　思いで\n
お待ち　申し上げて　おりました！！
column6: We've been expecting your arrival in Musashi for the longest of time!

column5:
この　雲切の里で\n
万全の　準備を　ととのえて\n
ご出発くださいませ！！
column6: Make sure to be fully prepared before you leave!

column5:
西に見える　まっかな　城壁の中に\n
大門教が　守る\n
五つの　城が　あります！！
column6: The red walls you see to the west cover the five castles of the Cult of Daimon!

column5:
その城の名は　北から\n
前橋城・・・\n
おし城・・・
column6:
Going from north to south, they are: Maebashi Castle...\n
Oshi Castle...

column5:
いわつき城・・・\n
かわごえ城・・・\n
そして　江戸城でございます！
column6:
Iwatsuki Castle...\n
Kawagoe Castle...\n
And finally, Edo Castle!

column5:
北の　富士見村には\n
大門教から　逃れて　来た人たちが\n
かくれているのです
column6: Those who have escaped from the Cult of Daimon are hiding in Fujimi Village, to the north.

column5:
あの村は\n
神の力に　守られているので\n
大門教も　手が　出せないのです
column6: The Gods protect the village with their divine power, so the Daimonists cannot approach.

column5:
富士見村へ　たくさんの　白い光が\n
降りてゆくのを　見たわ\n
あの　美しい光は　なんだったのかしら
column6:
I saw a shower of white light pour down on Fujimi Village. It was so beautiful...\n
What could it have been?

column5:
邪神斎の　ムスコの　幻王丸は\n
マサカドを　守っていた　四匹の鬼を\n
配下に　おいたそうです
column6: Genoumaru, the son of Jashinsai, has Masakado's four demon beasts under his command.

column5:
この　知らせを　さいごに\n
江戸の　仲間からの\n
連絡が　とだえました
column6: That was the final intel we received from our allies in Edo.

column5:
雲切のおやぶんの　命令で\n
この里の　宿屋　よろず屋は\n
すべて　無料になって　います
column6: Chief Kumogiri has instructed us to let you rest at the inn and get supplies at the general store for free!

column5:
どうぞ　ジライアさん！\n
十分　準備を　ととのえて\n
江戸へ　向かってください！！
column6: Be sure you are prepared for your journey to Edo, Ziria-san!

column5:
富士見村は\n
昔から　神に守られた\n
神聖なる地ですじゃ
column6: Fujimi Village is built on holy ground, guarded by the Gods since ancient times.

column5:
ジパングに　危機が　迫ったとき\n
神獣さまが　お集まりになると\n
いわれて　おりますじゃ
column6: When danger looms over Jipang, the divine beasts will gather there, or so it is told.

column5:
ジライアさん！！\n
ちば国の　仲間からの\n
情報が　届いてますぜ！
column6: Ziria-san! We've received a report from our allies in Chiba!

column5:
なんでも　大門教の　連中は\n
獄門島から　新兵器を　このむさし国へ\n
運び込んだって　話ですぜ！
column6: It seems the Daimonists have sent some kind of new weapon from Gokumon Island!

column5: 宿屋
column6: Inn

column5:
火の勇者さまから\n
お金は　いただけないよ！\n
どうぞ　ごゆっくり！！
column6:
Make yourselves at home!\n
The Fire Heroes don't need to pay!

column5:
大門教を　かならず\n
やっつけて　くださいよ！！
column6: Take down the Cult of Daimon once and for all!

column5:
江戸に　行くには\n
北の　前橋の町から\n
まわって　行くしかねぇ
column6: The only way to reach Edo is to start from the northmost town, Maebashi.

column5:
いよいよですね\n
ぜひ　ここでも\n
きろくしてってください
column6: You're almost there! Please, allow me to record your progress.

column5:
まあ　ゆっくり休むのも必要だが\n
いそげよ！
column6: Though resting is important, there's little time left!

column5:
あせらずにな\n
がんばれよ！
column6: Stay calm. You can do this!

column5: よろず屋
column6: General Store

column5:
いらっしゃい　ジライアさん！！\n
さあ　なんでも　持っててください！\n
お役に　立ちますぜ
column6:
Welcome, Ziria-san!\n
Here, take these items!\n
Hopefully you'll find them useful!
column7: ZenkiTN: you receive four items every time you speak.

column5:
がんばってくださいよ！\n
みんな　オーエンしてますぜ！！
column6: Good luck! We're all cheering for you!

column5: 富士見神社
column6: Fujimi Village

column5:
ここは　富士見村です\n
大門教が　こわくて\n
みんな　ここに　かくれているんです
column6:
This is Fujimi Village.\n
We're hiding from the Cult of Daimon.

column5:
マサカドが　復活したら\n
このジパングは　どうなってしまうの\n
考えただけで・・・
column6: What's going to happen to our beautiful Jipang if Masakado is revived...?

column5:
この　富士見神社は\n
ジパングの　神獣さまの　すべてを\n
おまつりして　あるんだ
column6:
This village worships all of the divine beasts of Jipang.\n
They'll protect us.

column5:
だから　ここは　神獣さまが\n
かならず　守ってくださるんだ\n
でも　ここだけ　助かっても　イヤだい
column6: But it would be sad if this were the only safe place in Jipang...

column5:
わたしは　神獣さまの　お告げにより\n
前橋の　民を　この神社まで\n
みちびいて来た　ミコです
column6: I am the shrine maiden sent by the divine beasts to lead the people of Maebashi to safety.

column5:
むさし国の　町には\n
富士見神社から　分かれた\n
富士見のやしろが　立っております
column6: There is a Fujimi shrine inside every town of Musashi.

column5:
命が　あやうくなったら\n
お立ちより　ください\n
神獣さまが　守ってくれるでしょう
column6: If you're ever in danger, enter the shrines. The divine beasts will protect you.

column5:
おれは　前橋の火消し　だったんだが\n
ダチの　トビマサが　よう！\n
まだ　前橋に　残ってんだ！
column6:
I'm a fireman from Maebashi.\n
My friend Tobimasa is still there!

column5:
逃げおくれやがって　のろまな野郎だ\n
ジライアさん！\n
のろまの　トビマサを　助けてくれ！！
column6: That slowpoke literally couldn't run to save his life! You have to find him, Ziria-san!

column5:
わたしの　住んでいた\n
前橋の町にも　富士見神社と同じ\n
まっ白な　富士見やしろが　あるんです
column6:
There's a shrine in Maebashi.\n
It's completely white, like the shrine in this village.

column5:
富士見やしろは　みんな　純白です！\n
神獣さまと　同じに\n
白く　ぬられて　いるんですよ
column6: All the Fujimi shrines are white, just like the divine beasts!

column5:
前橋は　見たこともない　火をふく\n
土の魔人に　おそわれたんだ！！\n
カラクリ兵より　ずっと　大きいんだ！
column6: Maebashi was attacked by clay demons that could shoot fire! They were bigger than the clockwork soldiers!

column5:
あんなのと　戦うの？\n
ジライアの　おにいちゃん\n
負けちゃうよ
column6:
Are you really going to fight them?\n
Don't do it! They'll turn you to ashes!

column5:
火の勇者さま！！\n
この神社で　神獣さまが\n
お待ちして　おります！
column6: Fire Heroes! The divine beasts are waiting for you inside the shrine!

column5:
ジライアさま！\n
ツナデさま！\n
オロチ丸さま！
column6:
Ziria-sama!\n
Tsunade-sama!\n
Orochimaru-sama!

column5:
大門教との　決戦のまえに\n
神獣さまの　お力を\n
たまわり　くださいませ！
column6: Receive the blessing of the divine beasts before your final confrontation with the Cult of Daimon!

column5:
火の勇者は　どんな　ときでも\n
勇気と　愛と　根性を\n
もって　いるんだよネ！　ネ！　ネ！！
column6:
The Fire Heroes will always fight with courage, love, and determination!\n
Right? Right?

column5: 富士見社
column6: Fujimi Shrine

column5:
元気で　やっていたか　火の勇者よ！\n
このさきは　大門教の本山だ！\n
ますます　敵も　てごわくなるだろう
column6:
How have you been, Fire Heroes?\n
You are finally approaching the main base of the Cult of Daimon.

column5:
いよいよ　最後の　戦いのときは\n
迫っているぞ！　今まで　覚えたことを\n
すべて　出しきるのだ！
column6: As you head towards your final battle, keep in mind everything you have learned during your journey!

column5:
神から　たまわった！\n
この　神通の剣を　さずけよう！
column6: I bestow upon you a gift from the gods: the Sword of the Divine!

column5:
くじけそうに　なったときは\n
富士見やしろへ　行くがよい！\n
がんばるのだ　ジライア！
column6:
If ever you lose heart, come visit us in one of the Fujimi shrines.\n
Go forth, Ziria!

column5: 神通の剣を　手に入れた
column6: Obtained Sword of the Divine.

column5:
火の勇者よ！\n
「力」を　あたえよう！
column6: Fire Heroes, I shall restore your energy!

column5:
われら神獣は　つねに　おまえたちと\n
ともに　いる！\n
そのことを　忘れるでないぞ！
column6: Never forget: we divine beasts are always with you!

column5: まえばし町
column6: Maebashi Town

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
中には　かやく玉が　入っていた
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There is a gunpowder orb inside.

column5: かやく玉を　手に入れた
column6: Obtained Gunpowder Orb.

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
中には　なにも　入っていなかった
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There is nothing inside.

column5: まえばし城
column6: Maebashi Castle

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
中には　白キジの尾が　入っていた
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There is a White Pheasant tail inside.

column5: 白キジの尾を　手に入れた
column6: Obtained White Pheasant Tail.

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
中には　なにも　入っていなかった
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There is nothing inside.

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
中には　どくけしが　入っていた
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There is an antidote inside.

column5: どくけしを　手に入れた
column6: Obtained Antidote.

column5: まえばし城
column6: Maebashi Castle

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
中には　仙丹が　入っていた
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There is an elixir inside.

column5: 仙丹を　手に入れた
column6: Obtained Elixir.

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
中には　なにも　入っていなかった
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There is nothing inside.

column5: まえばし城
column6: Maebashi Castle

column5:
よくきた　ジライア！！\n
わたしが　邪心斎の　ムスコ\n
幻王丸だ！！
column6:
Well met, Ziria!\n
I am Genoumaru, son of Jashinsai!

column5: わたしの　ちから　みせてやろう！！
column6: Behold my power!

column5:
幻王丸は　不思議な術を使った\n
ジライアたちの\n
体の力が　うばわれた！！[color]<$00>
column6: Genoumaru used a mysterious technique to reduce the health of Ziria's party![color]<$00>

column5:
ハハハハ　これが　ほんとうの\n
デーモン族の力よ！
column6: Bwahahaha! This is the true power of the Demon clan!

column5:
あとは　シテンと　あそべ　ジライア！\n
いでよ！　泥黒鬼！！
column6: I'll leave you to play with one of the Four Fiends! Go forth, Deikokuki!

column5: 民家
column6: House

column5:
ジライアさんで！\n
おれは　この町の　火消しで\n
トビマサってんでさ！
column6:
Hey, Ziria-san!\n
Name's Tobimasa. I'm a firefighter!

column5:
この町を　おそった\n
火をふく　魔人は\n
水に　弱いんでさあ！！
column6: Those fire-breathing demons that attacked our town are actually weak to water!

column5:
火消しに　使ってた\n
手押ポンプさえ　あれば　魔人なんざ\n
おれでも　たおせたのに！！
column6: If only I had our hand pump, even I could beat them! Find it! You'll need it!

column5:
ジライアさん　雲切の里の者です\n
ジライアさんのために\n
秘密の　きろく所を　作っておきました
column6:
Ziria-san, I'm from Kumogiri Hamlet.\n
I'm here to record your progress in secret.

column5:
もちろん　お金は　いりません\n
きろく　しますか？
column6:
It's free, of course.\n
Should I write a record?

column5: それでは　きろく　します
column6: Let me write this down.

column5: また　お気軽に　どうぞ！
column6: Come back anytime!

column5: おし町
column6: Oshi Town

column5: おし城
column6: Oshi Castle

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
中には　武者よろいが　入っていた
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There is a warrior armor inside.

column5: 武者よろいを　手に入れた
column6: Obtained Warrior Armor.

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
中には　なにも　入っていなかった
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There is nothing inside.

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
中には　白ヘビの石が　入っていた
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There is a White Snake stone inside.

column5: 白ヘビの石を　手に入れた
column6: Obtained White Snake Stone.

column5: おし城
column6: Oshi Castle

column5: おし城
column6: Oshi Castle

column5:
ほう！　前橋城を　こえたか\n
さすが　ジライアよ！\n
この　幻王丸　感心したぞ！
column6:
So, you survived Maebashi Castle.\n
Well done, Ziria!\n
I must admit, I'm impressed!

column5:
だが　ここまでだ！\n
くらえ　デーモン族の　力！
column6:
But this is as far as you go.\n
Behold the power of the Demon clan!

column5:
// WARNING: continues previous box
お前たちの　術は封じた！！
column6:
\n
I have sealed your jutsu!

column5:
シテンと　あそべ　ジライア！\n
いでよ！　暗鉄鬼！！
column6: You may play with one of the Four Fiends! Go forth, Antetsuki!

column5: 宿屋
column6: Inn

column5:
潅涼淬いらっしゃいませ！\n
お泊まりは１０両\n
お泊まりですか
column6:
Welcome!\n
It's 両10 for the night.\n
Will you stay?

column5:
潅涼淬ゆっくり休めましたか\n
行ってらっしゃい！
column6:
Did you rest well?\n
Have a nice day!

column5: 潅涼淬いつでもご利用ください
column6: Come back anytime.

column5: 潅涼淬ごゆっくりどうぞ！
column6: Rest well!

column5:
お客様・・・\n
まことに申し訳ありませんが\n
お泊まりは１０両となっております
column6: Uhm, sir...I'm sorry, but it's 両10 to stay.

column5: いらっしゃいませ
column6: Welcome.

column5: 米屋
column6: Rice Shop

column5:
米屋でございます\n
お買物でしたら、奥のカウンターへ\n
どうぞ
column6:
This is a rice shop.\n
Please head to the counter to make a purchase.

column5:
おミッちゃん\n
どうしているかな・・・・・
column6: I wonder how Micchan's doing...

column5: いわつき町
column6: Iwatsuki Town

column5:
この　いわつきの町は　大門教と\n
ショーグンさまの　軍隊が　戦った\n
激戦の地じゃ！！
column6: The town of Iwatsuki was where the army of the Shogun clashed with the Cult of Daimon!

column5:
せっしゃも　その　ひとりでござったが\n
大門教の　強さが　おそろしくなって\n
ここに　ずっと　かくれてござった！
column6: I was there on the battlefield...But after witnessing their might, I hid myself here.

column5:
わが軍は　大敗をきした！\n
ショーグンさまの　おん身が\n
どうなったのか　心配で　ござる！！
column6:
Our army was wiped out!\n
I'm worried about the Shogun...\n
I hope he's safe!

column5: 奥宮
column6: Rear Shrine

column5:
布都の剣はこの神社の奥\n
宝物殿にまつられています\n
この剣はヘビが守っているんです
column6: The Futsunomitama is stored in this shrine, guarded by a snake.
column7: ZenkiTN: the Futsunomitama is a divine sword described in the "Record of Ancient Matters". Not that it matters (the pun nobody will hear).

column5:
大変だ！布都の剣が盗まれた！！\n
そのたたりじゃ！\n
茨城の鬼があばれだしたそうだ
column6:
This is terrible! The Futsunomitama has been stolen! This is a curse!\n
The oni of Ibaraki are rampaging!

column5: 奥宮
column6: Rear Shrine

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
中には　いざよい刀が　入っていた
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There is an Izayoi sword inside.

column5: いざよい刀を　手に入れた
column6: Obtained Izayoi Sword.

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
中には　なにも　入っていなかった
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There is nothing inside.

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
中には　どくけしが　入っていた
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There is an antidote inside.

column5: どくけしを　手に入れた
column6: Obtained Antidote.

column5: いわつき城
column6: Iwatsuki Castle

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
中には　なにも　入っていなかった
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There is nothing inside.

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
中には　神丹が　入っていた
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There is a God elixir inside.

column5: 神丹を　手に入れた！！
column6: Obtained God Elixir!

column5: いわつき城
column6: Iwatsuki Castle

column5: いわつき城
column6: Iwatsuki Castle

column5:
ええい！　しつこい　やつめ！！\n
幻王丸を　なめるな！！\n
これでも　くらえ！！
column6: Argh! How dare you make a fool out of me?! Take this!

column5:
幻王丸は　不思議な術を使った\n
ジライアたちは　術を封じられた！！
column6: Genoumaru used a mysterious technique to seal the party's jutsu!

column5:
さあ　ゆっくり　シテンと　あそべ！\n
いでよ！　銀老鬼！！
column6:
Have fun with one of the Four Fiends!\n
Go forth, Ginrouki!

column5: 民家
column6: House

column5:
もう　どこにも　逃げ場は　ないわ\n
大門教は　ジパングの　すべてを\n
支配して　しまうのよ！！
column6:
There's nowhere left to run...\n
The Daimonists are going to conquer Jipang!

column5:
マサカドが　復活してしまえば\n
何もなくなって　しまうわ！！\n
大門教に　入るしか　ないの？！！
column6: Once Masakado is back, he'll destroy everything! Do we have no choice but to join the Cult of Daimon?!

column5:
ジライアさん！！\n
あなたしか　いないのよ！！\n
おねがいします！！
column6:
Ziria-san! You're our only hope!\n
Please, save us!

column5:
ジライアさん　雲切の里の者です\n
ジライアさんのために\n
秘密の　きろく所を　作っておきました
column6:
Ziria-san, I'm from Kumogiri Hamlet.\n
I'm here to record your progress in secret.

column5:
もちろん　お金は　いりません\n
きろく　しますか？
column6:
It's free, of course.\n
Should I write a record?

column5: それでは　きろく　します
column6: Let me write this down.

column5: また　お気軽に　どうぞ！
column6: Come back anytime!

column5: かわごえ町
column6: Kawagoe Town

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
中には　天地のオノが　入っていた
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There is a Tenchi axe inside.

column5: 天地のオノを　手に入れた
column6: Obtained Tenchi Axe.

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
中には　なにも　入っていなかった
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There is nothing inside.

column5: かわごえ城
column6: Kawagoe Castle

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
中には　獣のわらじが　入っていた
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There is a pair of beast sandals inside.

column5: 獣のわらじを　手に入れた
column6: Obtained Beast Sandals.

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
中には　なにも　入っていなかった
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There is nothing inside.

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
中には　白ガマの油が　入っていた
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There is White Toad oil inside.

column5: 白ガマの油を　手に入れた
column6: Obtained White Toad Oil.

column5: かわごえ城
column6: Kawagoe Castle

column5: かわごえ城
column6: Kawagoe Castle

column5:
ほんとうに　この幻王丸を\n
怒らせたな！　ジライア！！\n
これを　くらえ！！
column6: You have no idea how much you've angered me, Ziria! Take THIS!!

column5:
幻王丸は　不思議な術を使った\n
ジライアたちは　ねむらされた！！
column6: Genoumaru used a mysterious technique to put Ziria's party to sleep!

column5:
さいごの　シテンだ！\n
いでよ！　金剛鬼！
column6:
This is the last of the Four Fiends!\n
Go forth, Kongouki!

column5:
お・・おのれ！　ジライア！！\n
こんどは　この　大門教１３人衆の\n
１２番手　幻王丸が　相手だ！！
column6: C-Curse you, Ziria! This time, you fight ME! I am the twelfth of the Thirteen Daimon Cultists, Genoumaru!
column7: NOTE: mysteriously, this text is not used

column5:
つよいな・・・　ジライアよ！\n
だが　マサカドは　すでに・・・\n
われらの　もの　もうおそいわ・・
column6:
You're strong, Ziria...\n
But it's too late...Masakado is already ours...

column5:
この　ジパングは\n
大門教が　すべて　支配するのだ！！
column6: Jipang will fall to the Cult of Daimon!
column7: NOTE: ...although this specific line is used as the very last of the attract mode demos

column5:
// WARNING: continues previous box
ハハハハ・・・・
column6:
\n
Hahahaha...

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
中には　なにも　入っていなかった
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
There is nothing inside.

column5:
つづらの中を　調べた\n
中には　有明の巻物が　入っていた
column6:
You look inside the casket.\n
You find the scroll of Ariake.

column5: 有明の巻物を　手に入れた\n
column6: Obtained Scroll of Ariake.\n

column5: かわごえ城
column6: Kawagoe Castle

column5:
うう〜　苦しいよ〜\n
はやく　楽にしてくれ〜
column6:
Urgh...I'm suffering...\n
Please, deliver me from this pain...

column5:
死ぬほど　拷問されてよ\n
恐怖が　絶頂になった　しゅんかんに\n
たましいを　引きぬかれた！
column6:
I was tortured to death...\n
The moment your fear is at its peak, you lose your soul!

column5:
人の　恨みや　憎しみの　こもった\n
たましいほど　マサカドは\n
よろこぶって　いうんだ
column6: Masakado delights in souls filled with regret and hatred...

column5:
ここにいる　たましいは　みんな\n
マサカドに　喰われちまうんだ\n
つぎは　おれの番かもしれない
column6: Masakado consumes the souls that end up here...It could be my turn next...

column5:
はやく　わたしたちを\n
もとの姿に　もどしてください！
column6: Please, return us to our bodies!

column5: 民家
column6: House

column5:
ジライアさん！\n
江戸は　大門教の　そうくつに\n
なっているに　ちがいない！
column6: Ziria-san! At this point, Edo has become a Daimonist lair.

column5:
江戸の　邪神斎に\n
この町の　人間も\n
連れて　行かれてしまった！
column6: Most of the residents of our town have already been sent to Jashinsai.

column5:
もう　江戸の人々は　たましいを\n
ぬかれて　しまっとる　かもしれん！！\n
一刻も　早く　江戸へ！！
column6: I'm afraid he may have already taken their souls...You must hurry to Edo!

column5:
ジライアさん　雲切の里の者です\n
ジライアさんのために\n
秘密の　きろく所を　作っておきました
column6:
Ziria-san, I'm from Kumogiri Hamlet.\n
I'm here to record your progress in secret.

column5:
きろく　しますか？\n
もちろん　お金は　いりません
column6:
It's free, of course.\n
Should I write a record?

column5: それでは　きろく　します
column6: Let me write this down.

column5: また　お気軽に　どうぞ！
column6: Come back anytime!

column5: 江戸
column6: Edo

column5:
おーら　どけどけ！\n
ここは　花の　お江戸　でえい！\n
モタモタすんねえ！
column6:
Hey, you! Outta the way!\n
This is Edo, city of flowers!\n
This ain't no place for the likes of --

column5:
おっと！　こりゃ　ジライアさん！\n
おみそれ　いたしやした・・・\n
もう　大門教は　かいめつですね！
column6: Oh, Ziria-san! Please, pardon my rudeness! The Cult of Daimon is all but gone, isn't it?

column5:
さあ！　さいごの　決戦ですぜ！\n
がんばって　おくんなさいよ！！\n
行け！　行け！　ジライア！
column6:
The final battle is at hand!\n
We believe in you, Ziria-san!

column5:
おいら　江戸っ子　でぇい！\n
ケンカ大好き　でぇい！
column6: We men from Edo love a good fight!

column5:
ジライアさん！　この大ゲンカ\n
あんたの　勝ちだね！\n
もう　勝ったも　おんなじ　でぇい！
column6:
Ziria-san! This is the biggest fight of all, and you're gonna come out on top!\n
You got this!

column5:
バンザーイ！　バンザーイ！\n
ジライア　勝った　大門教まけだ！
column6:
Huzzah! Huzzah!\n
Ziria won, and the Daimonists are gone!

column5:
大門教の　さいごの　\n
ボスは　城にいる　邪神斎だけ！\n
ちょちょいと　かたづけちゃいやしょう
column6:
There's only Jashinsai left!\n
Go kick his butt and come back to the party!

column5:
キャー！　ジライアさんでしょ！\n
大門教の　総大将　邪神斎は\n
江戸城に　逃げ込んでるわ！
column6:
Omigosh! It's Ziria-san!\n
It seems that Jashinsai guy is hiding in Edo Castle.

column5:
あなたが　こわいのよ！\n
やっぱり　火の勇者の　伝説は\n
ほんとだったのねえ
column6:
He must be scared of you!\n
He must have heard the legends too!

column5:
オロチ丸さんって　ハンサムねぇ\n
邪神斎なんて　左手の　小指の先で\n
やっつけて　デートしましょうよ
column6: Oh, my. You're so handsome, Orochimaru! How about you crush Jashinsai real quick so we can enjoy an evening together?

column5:
あなたが　ジライアさんね\n
ねぇ　ツナデちゃんを　連れて行くと\n
いいことが　あるわョ！
column6: Are you Ziria-san? Then that must be Tsunade-chan. Why don't you bring her to the kimono shop?

column5:
呉服屋で　たのしめるわョ\n
おもしろい　催し物が　あるのョ！
column6:
There's a special event going on.\n
You don't want to miss it!

column5:
おめえ　しってっかー？\n
大門教ってよ　インチキなんだぜ\n
えっ？　ごぞんじでいらっしゃる・・
column6:
Hey, did you know?\n
The Cult of Daimon is a sham!

column5:
こりゃまった　しつれー\n
いたしやしたーっと！
column6:
Huh? You knew?\n
Guess that's old news. Hahaha!

column5:
ジライアさん！　江戸のミヤゲに\n
ひとつ　見てってくんな！\n
ジパング　いちの　曲芸だ！
column6: Ziria-san! Since you're in Edo, you simply HAVE to see this show! It's the most fantastic exhibition in Jipang!

column5:
水が　飛ぶ！　水が　おどる！\n
マカフシギの　大スペクタクルショー！\n
さあ　入った　入った！
column6:
Water soaring into the air and dancing!\n
This isn't just entertainment, it's ART!\n
Please, come on in!

column5:
あしたは　おまつりよ\n
今日は　その　前夜祭なの\n
ゆっくり　楽しんでいってね
column6: There's going to be a festival tomorrow, so we're throwing a party for its eve.

column5:
ジライアさん！\n
アンタが　主役よ！！\n
邪神斎なんか　馬の前足の　役よ！！
column6: We're celebrating you, Ziria-san! And Jashinsai won't even be a footnote!

column5:
邪神斎は　マサカドの　復活を\n
記念して　明日　おまつりを\n
するんじゃ！
column6: Did you know Jashinsai is planning a festival tomorrow to celebrate Masakado's return?

column5:
わらかして　くれるのう\n
あんまり　おもしろいので\n
わしら　前夜祭を　してるんじゃ！！
column6: So we've decided to throw our own festival today, just to make fun of him.

column5:
邪神斎が　どう　がんばっても\n
もう　火の勇者さまに\n
勝てる　わけがないのにのう！
column6: After all, there's no way Jashinsai can defeat the Fire Heroes!

column5:
あんた　知ってるかい？\n
まつりの　前夜祭とかで\n
今日は　カブキが　タダなんじゃ
column6: Did you know? Just for today, the kabuki show is free for all.

column5:
きっと　おもしろいもんが\n
見られますよ
column6: You should watch it. I'm sure you'll enjoy it!

column5:
まあ　これが　世の中　すっかり\n
べんりに　なってのう\n
飛脚屋　といってな
column6: The world is more connected than ever!

column5:
手紙を　あずかって\n
きてくれる　ところが\n
この町には　あるんじゃよ！
column6: There's a new service in town called a {post office.} They'll deliver your letters for you!

column5:
あんたにも　手紙が\n
きとるかもしれん\n
飛脚屋に　行ってみるがよい
column6:
You should go to the post office.\n
Who knows, you might have received a letter!

column5:
ひえーっ　おどろいたの　なんのって\n
地震だよ　地震！！\n
えっ　なんにも　おきてないってー？
column6:
Oh man, that earthquake was so scary!\n
Huh? There was no earthquake, you say?

column5:
あたぼうよ　あっしが　いっとるのは\n
町の火消しと　ガイジンが　作った\n
地震たいけん室の　ことさ！
column6: I know that! I'm talking about the Earthquake Experience a town firefighter and visiting foreigner created!

column5:
あんなのが　ほんとうに　おこったら\n
こわいよー！\n
おめえも　行ってみな
column6:
That'll give you a glimpse of how terrifying an earthquake could be!\n
You should go check it out!

column5:
見せ物小屋は　おもしろいぜ！\n
前夜祭で　タダだから\n
ぜったい　見ないと　ソンだぜ！！
column6:
The show tent is so much fun!\n
Plus, it's completely free for today!\n
You should really go and check it out!

column5:
カンオケ屋に　大門教から　三つ！\n
とくべつ注文が　あったって！
column6: I heard the Cult of Daimon ordered three coffins from the coffin maker!

column5:
邪神斎の　おどしよ！\n
今どき　セコイ　おどしよね！
column6: I bet Jashinsai thinks it's a real funny joke! He's so petty!

column5:
カンオケ屋のおやじも　おもしろがって\n
注文どうりに　作ってるわ\n
ジライアさまも　のぞいてみて！
column6:
The coffin maker is going through with the order anyway.\n
Why don't you go and see for yourself?

column5:
おお　ジライアさん\n
石屋が　あんたがた　三人の\n
石像を　彫っとったよ
column6: Oh, Ziria-san. Did you know our stonemason carved statues of the three Fire Heroes?

column5:
なかなか　いいデキじゃった\n
ぜひ　見にゆくがよい
column6:
They're very well done!\n
You should check them out!

column5:
まつりは　いいねえ\n
酒は　うまいし　ネエちゃんは　きれい\n
なんでもいいよ　まつりならさ！
column6: I love festivals. The booze is good, and the ladies are nice! I don't care what we celebrate as long as we get to party!

column5:
あと１人！　あと一人！\n
あと１人！　あと一人！
column6:
Only one left! Only one left!\n
Only one left! Only one left!

column5:
大門教の　命も　あとわずか\n
うれしいねえ　パーッといこうぜ\n
パーッと！！
column6:
You almost beat those Daimonists, huh?\n
This is great! C'mon, let's party!

column5:
大門教は　\n
あと１人！　あと一人！\n
あと１人！　あと一人！
column6:
The Cult of Daimon is almost gone!\n
Only one left! Only one left!\n
Only one left! Only one left!

column5:
月姫さまは　やさいしいだけじゃなくて\n
とても　ベッピンなんだ！\n
おいら　大ファン　なんだぜ！
column6: Tsukihime-sama isn't just kind, she's also really pretty! I'm a big fan, I tell ya!

column5:
だけど　心配ごとが　あるのか\n
さいきん　笑顔が　消えちまって\n
いつも　しずんでるんだ
column6: But she must be worried about something. I haven't seen her smile in a while...

column5:
そういえば　ジライアさんに\n
相談が　あるって　いってたな\n
早く　行ってやんな！！
column6:
Come to think of it, she said she wanted to talk to you, Ziria-san.\n
Don't keep her waiting!

column5:
ふざけるなよ！　邪神斎！\n
出てこい！　マサカド！\n
ここにいるのは　ジライアさんだぞ！
column6:
Screw you, Jashinsai!\n
Show yourself, Masakado!\n
Ziria-san is right here!

column5:
ちぇっ！　弱虫め！\n
ジライアさんに\n
ビビッてんだぜ！　まったく！
column6: Hah! I knew it! They must be scared of you!

column5:
宿屋で　体力を\n
マンタンにして\n
ひとひねりに　しやしょうぜ！
column6: I guess I'll head to the inn and catch a few Z's!

column5:
マサカドの　復活祭じゃと！\n
ちゃんちゃら　おかしくて\n
ヘソが　茶を　わかすぞ！！
column6: A festival to celebrate Masakado's return? That is the most laughable load of crap I've heard in years!

column5:
邪神斎の　スットコドッコイ\n
追い詰められて\n
頭が　ぷっつんしたんじゃないかのう
column6: If you ask me, Jashinsai probably lost his marbles because he knows you're going to get him soon.

column5:
あんまり　かわいそうじゃから\n
わしらも　ノッてやることに　してのう\n
そんで　前夜祭して　やっとんのよ
column6: We felt so sorry for him that we decided to throw this little party.

column5:
まあ　あしたが　見ものじゃて\n
ハハハハハハハハ！
column6: I wish I could see his face tomorrow. Hahahaha!

column5:
なんでも　江戸で　一番大きな宿屋で\n
おもしろい　催しを　してるそうよ！\n
わたしも　行ってみよーっと
column6:
I've heard that Edo's biggest inn is doing some kind of special promotion!\n
Maybe I should go and check it out!

column5:
くそー！　オレが\n
９９９９９人目だってよ\n
まいったなあ！！
column6:
What rotten luck! The innkeeper told me I was their 99,999th guest!\n
I was so close to winning a free stay!

column5:
えっ！　ここの宿屋だよ！！宿屋！！\n
もう　間にあわないかも　しれないけど\n
アンタも　行ってみたら！！
column6: Yeah, I'm talking about this inn right here. Why don't you try as well? It's probably too late, but you never know!

column5:
ショーグンさまの　娘の　月姫さまを\n
知ってるかい？　あんなに\n
やさしい　おかたは　いないぜ！
column6:
Do you know about Tsukihime-sama, daughter of the Shogun?\n
She's a very kind soul!

column5:
お城に　住んでいるのに　町民との\n
ふれあいが　大切だからって\n
毎日　町を　歩いてるんだよ
column6: Even though she lives in the castle, she walks around the town every day to bond with common folk like us!

column5:
きょうは　お城の　そばで\n
見かけたなあ！　ジライアさんを\n
捜していた　みたいだな
column6:
I saw her walk near the castle today.\n
It seems she's looking for you, Ziria-san.

column5:
おそいじゃんかよー！　あれっ\n
なんだ　彼女じゃ　ないのか・・・\n
これから　デートなんだ　ウキウキ！
column6:
You're late!\n
...Oh, sorry. I'm waiting for my girlfriend.\n
We're going on a date. Heh heh heh!

column5:
あのバカ　おそいわねー！\n
また　場所を　まちがえてるんだわ\n
もう　あんな　オトコ　ふってやる！
column6:
Ugh! That idiot is late!\n
I bet he got the place wrong again!\n
Oh, that's it! I'm dumping him!

column5:
江戸城に　入れないとは　困りましたな\n
そんなときは　宿屋にでも　とまって\n
一晩　ゆっくり　考えてみるんですね
column6: If you can't find a way to enter Edo Castle, it might be worth it to just sleep on it at the inn.

column5:
江戸は　でっけーだろ！　おれなんて\n
みちに　迷って　３日も　家に\n
帰れねーんだよお　たすけてくれー
column6:
Edo is big...Too big! I'm lost! Totally lost!\n
I haven't been home in three days!\n
Can someone help me already?!

column5:
江戸には　いろんなことが　あるから\n
ひととおり　見て楽しんでください\n
とくに　見せ物小屋は　見逃せませんよ
column6:
There's a lot to see in Edo.\n
You should take a look around!\n
I highly recommend the show tent.

column5:
ボクねー　このまえ　道で\n
ころんで　ケガしちゃったんだ
column6: The other day I was running and I fell on the ground and I scraped my knee.

column5:
だけど　月姫さまが\n
自分の　着物を　やぶいて\n
ボクに　ホウタイを　してくれたの
column6: But then Tsukihime-sama helped me up and she ripped her kimono and she bandaged me.

column5:
ボク　月姫さま　大好きだよ！\n
おにいちゃんたちも　月姫さまに\n
会ったら　きっと　好きになるよ
column6:
I love Tsukihime-sama!\n
After you talk to her you'll love her too!

column5:
あっ！　オロチ丸！\n
待っていました！\n
わたしです　ショーグンの娘　月姫です
column6:
Ah, Orochimaru! I've been waiting for you.\n
I am Tsukihime, daughter of the Shogun.

column5:
父に　つかえる　オロチ丸が\n
火の勇者の　ひとりとして\n
ジライアさまと　いっしょに
column6: You've always been a faithful servant to Father. I know you've joined forces with Ziria-sama as one of the Fire Heroes,

column5:

column6: Warehouse

column5: 林崎道場
column6: Hayashizaki Dojo

column5:
また来ましたね\n
お手並拝見しましょう
column6:
You're back.\n
Show me what you've got.

column5:
もうあなたに教えることは\n
なにもありません　おこたらずに\n
修行をつづけてください
column6:
I have nothing more to teach you.\n
Never stop training.

column5:
みごとでしたな　自来也どの！\n
ますます剣をみがかれよ
column6:
A splendid display, Ziria-dono!\n
Keep improving yourself!

column5: 米沢城
column6: Yonezawa Castle

column5: 預かり所
column6: Warehouse

column6: Nekomagatake

自来也は布袋丸にもらった爆弾を扉に\n
セットした
column6: Ziria placed the bomb he received from Hoteimaru on the gate.

column5: 蛇泉洞
column6: Snake Spring Cave

column5:
わたしはオロチ丸様の手下\n
オロチ丸様が三戸でお待ちです\n
お会いになって下さい
column6:
I am a servant of Orochimaru-sama.\n
Orochimaru-sama is waiting for you in Mito.

column5:
[f6]<$1C>ここに蛇の玉がある\n
ムカデの化け物が守ってやがって\n
俺は一人で入って行けないんだ
column6: [f6]<$1C>The Snake treasure is in here, but it's guarded by a centipede monster. I can't go there by myself.

column5:
たのむ！　自来也\n
俺と一緒にムカデの化け物を\n
やっつけてくれ
column6: Ziria, help me fight the centipede monster!

column5:
オロチ丸が待っているという意味を\n
持ったメッセージを入れて下さい。
column6: Please include a message explaining that Orochimaru is waiting.
column7: ZenkiTN: wow, is this a developer comment?

column5: 預かり所
column6: Warehouse

column5: 賭場
column6: Gambling Den

column5:
ジライアさん　じゃないですかぁ！\n
こんな所で　遊んでいて　いいんですか\n
まっ　たまには　息ぬきしないとね
column6:
My, if it isn't Ziria-san!\n
Should you really be here?\n
Eh, I guess it's fine every once in a while!

column5:
ツボふりの　ネエちゃん　きれいだろ！\n
もう　ちょっとで\n
見えそう　なんだけどなあ！！
column6:
The dice lady is a real babe!\n
When I play, I'm not exactly looking at the dice, if you catch my drift!

column5:
二つの　サイコロの目を　たして\n
偶数なら　「丁」で\n
奇数なら　「半」だ！
column6:
It's a simple game!\n
Just bet whether the sum of the two dice will be even or odd!

column5: 賭場
column6: Gambling Den

column5:
ジライアさん　じゃないですかぁ！\n
こんな所で　遊んでいて　いいんですか\n
まっ　たまには　息ぬきしないとね
column6:
My, if it isn't Ziria-san!\n
Should you really be here?\n
Eh, I guess it's fine every once in a while!

column5:
ツボふりの　ネエちゃん　きれいだろ！\n
もう　ちょっとで\n
見えそう　なんだけどなあ！！
column6:
The dice lady is a real babe!\n
When I play, I'm not exactly looking at the dice, if you catch my drift!

column5:
二つの　サイコロの目を　たして\n
偶数なら　「丁」で\n
奇数なら　「半」だ！
column6:
It's a simple game!\n
Just bet whether the sum of the two dice will be even or odd!

column5: 神社
column6: Shrine

column5:
マサカドが復活するとき\n
魔物があつまり\n
やみが　おおいつくすという
column6: If Masakado is revived, the demons of Hell will invade Jipang, and the world will be engulfed in darkness.

column5:
そんなことに　ならないように\n
ひとつ　おねがいしますよ！！\n
ジライアさん
column6: You cannot let that happen, Ziria-san!

column5: 神社
column6: Shrine

column5:
マ　マ　マサカドが！！\n
戻ってくる！！！\n
ヤミが　ヤミが　迫ってくる！！
column6:
M-M-Masakado is coming!\n
Darkness! Darkness everywhere!

column5:
グウウウオオオ！！\n
無数の　たましいが\n
ヤミの底より　叫び！！
column6: Aaahhh!! The screams! The screaaams!!

column5:
苦しみの　悲痛の　苦悩の　叫びじゃ！\n
救われぬ　たましいが\n
江戸の　地下に　あふれておる！！
column6:
Pain! Grief! Agony!\n
Souls, lost forever, screaming from the depths of Edo!!

column5: 武蔵
column6: Musashi

column5:
獄門島で雲霧仁左ェ門が\n
反乱を起こしました\n
獄門島は大爆発を起こしました
column6: Kumogiri Nizaemon led a revolt on Gokumon Island, followed by a huge explosion.

column5: 筑波
column6: Tsukuba

column5: 矢切の渡し
column6: Yagiri Ferry

column5:
[f6]<$31>筑波へ帰るのか\n
渡してやろう\n
でも急げよ
column6: [f6]<$31>Are you going back to Tsukuba? I'll take you there, but we'd better hurry.

column5: 矢切の渡し
column6: Yagiri Ferry

column5:
焼愼[f6]<$2F>・・おまえがうらやましい・・\n
オレもおまえの様に生きてみたい\n
信じなくてもいいいが
column6:
...I envy you.\n
Believe it or not, I wish I could live like you.

column5:
ここで待っていたのは\n
オレひとりの判断だ\n
おまえにしばらくついていこうと思う
column6:
It was my decision alone to wait here.\n
I think I'll follow you for a while.

column5:
[f6]<$32>はやく江戸へ行かないと\n
邪神斎の力がますます大きくなる\n
急げ自来也
column6:
[f6]<$32>If we don't get to Edo soon, Jashinsai will gain greater strength.\n
Let's hurry, Ziria.

column5: 土浦城下町
column6: Tsuchiura Castle Town

column5:
ここは　つちうら城だ\n
水戸の　コーモン様が　いらして\n
この町は　平和に　なった
column6:
This is Tsuchiura Castle.\n
Thanks to Koumon-sama's presence, our town is peaceful.

column5:
コーモン様は　水戸に　いたんだ\n
でも　大門教に　負けて\n
この　つちうら城に　にげたんだ
column6: Koumon-sama used to live in Mito, but the Cult of Daimon forced him to flee to Tsuchiura Castle.

column5:
コーモン様は　大門教から　この町を\n
守るため　橋を　渡れなくしたの
column6: Koumon-sama blocked the bridge to protect our town from the Cult of Daimon.

column5:
橋を　渡って　北の　川ぞいに\n
そらあ　スゴイ！　剣の名人！！\n
ボクデンさんの　道場が　あるだ
column6: Cross the bridge and follow the coast north and you'll find the dojo of an amazing fencer called Bokuden.

column5:
ボクデン道場では　だれにでも\n
剣の　ワザを　おしえて　くれるよ\n
ボクも　大きくなったら　いくんだ！
column6: The Bokuden Dojo teaches to anyone who wants to learn. I wanna go there when I grow up!

column5:
橋を　渡って　東に　行くと\n
盗人たちが　あつまっている\n
村が　あるらしい・・・
column6: Apparently, there's a village of thieves beyond the bridge, to the east...

column5:
ジライアさんだろ！　わかってるヨ\n
オレは　やしちってもんだ\n
コーモン様が　城でまってるぜ
column6:
Ziria-san, right? Name's Yashichi.\n
Koumon-sama's waiting for you at the castle.

column5:
大門教の　怪物が　これないように\n
橋を　止めてあるの・・・　安心して\n
くらせるわ
column6: With the bridge closed, we won't have to worry about those terrible Daimonist monsters.

column5:
大門教に　入ると　アクマに\n
されちゃうんだって・・・\n
おお　こわい！
column6: If you join the Cult of Daimon, you'll turn into a demon...That's a scary thought!

column5: 預かり所
column6: Warehouse

column5: いらっしゃい
column6: Welcome.

column5: ありがとうございます
column6: Thank you very much.

column5: 少しは遊んだほうがいいよ！ボク！
column6: It's okay to stop and relax from time to time!

column5: 武具屋
column6: Armory

column5: いらっしゃい
column6: Welcome.

column5: ありがとうございます
column6: Thank you very much.

column5: 少しは遊んだほうがいいよ！ボク！
column6: It's okay to stop and relax from time to time!

column5: 宿屋
column6: Inn

column5:
いらっしゃいませ！\n
１０両でございますが\n
おとまりですか？
column6:
Welcome!\n
It's 両10 for the night.\n
Will you stay?

column5:
それでは　\n
ごゆっくり　どうぞ
column6: Please rest well.

column5: また　どうぞ
column6: See you soon.

column5:
いってらっしゃいませ！\n
お気をつけて　ジライアさま
column6: Take care of yourself, Ziria-sama.

column5:
ガマ仙人とこの　ジライアだろ！\n
オレだよ・・　おさらばデンジさ\n
ちっちぇえとき　あそんだんだぜ
column6:
You're the kid raised by the Toad Hermit, right? It's me, Osaraba Denji.
#BOXPAUSE()
I used to play with you when you were just a li'l shrimp.

column5:
そうだ！　もし　旅で　困ったら\n
全国チェーンの　盗人村に　行きな\n
おめえのことは　知らせておくぜ！
column6:
If you're ever in trouble during your travels, visit one of the other thief villages. We've got a nation-wide network.
#BOXPAUSE()
I'll let them know about you!

column5:
水戸の　地下から　つぎの国に\n
ぬけられるが・・・　大門教が\n
支配しているんだ
column6: You can reach the next country from Mito's underground, but it's already under Daimonist control.

column5:
大門教さえいなくなれば\n
また北の国に行けるし\n
商売ができるんだがな・・・
column6: If the Daimonists were gone, I could finally go north. They're ruining my business...

column5: 民家
column6: House

column5:
ふるい　伝説に　よると\n
火の一族の　勇者たちとは\n
ガマ　ヘビ　ナメクジ族のことよ
column6: According to the old tales, the heroes of the Fire Clan descend from the Toad, Snake, and Slug clans.

column5: よろず屋
column6: General Store

column5: いらっしゃい
column6: Welcome.

column5: ありがとうございます
column6: Thank you very much.

column5: 少しは遊んだほうがいいよ！ボク！
column6: It's okay to stop and relax from time to time!

column5: 土浦城
column6: Tsuchiura Castle

column5:
ここは　つちうら城で　ござる\n
だれでも　入れますぞ
column6: This is Tsuchiura Castle. Everyone is welcome.

column5:
コーモン様は　誰にでも\n
会って　くださる
column6: Koumon-sama is willing to meet anyone.

column5:
コーモン様は\n
みとに帰られた・・
column6: Koumon-sama has returned to Mito.

column5: 土浦城
column6: Tsuchiura Castle

column5:
わたしが　スケさんです\n
コーモン様の　許しがあれば\n
橋は　渡れます
column6: I am Suke-san. You may cross the bridge, as long as Koumon-sama gives you permission.

column5:
わたし　カクさん　なにも　かくさん！\n
ヒミツ　ありません\n
タヌキじゃ　ありません
column6:
I am Kaku-san! Always praise the sun!\n
I have nothing to hide! And I'm no tanuki!

column5:
わしが　コーモンじゃ　ホッホッホ\n
ガマ族の　勇者　ジライアよ！\n
すでに　しらべは　ついておるよ
column6:
I am Koumon! Hoh hoh hoh!\n
Brave Ziria of the Toad clan!\n
We've already investigated the matter!
column7: ZenkiTN: while this is pretty pointless since this is an unused segment, I think the "investigation" part is a quote from the old jidaigeki Mito Koumon. You can see a similar quote in Sunsoft's own Mito Koumon famicom game.

column5:
つくばの国を　支配している\n
大門教を　やっつけられるのは\n
おまえしか　おらん！！
column6: You're the only one who can free the lands of Tsukuba from the Cult of Daimon!

column5:
どうじゃな　みんなのために\n
水戸城に　いる　大門教のゴーモンと\n
戦って　くれぬか？
column6: Would you fight against Goumon of the Cult of Daimon in Mito Castle for the sake of the people?

column5:
勇者　ジライアよ！　つくばの国を\n
支配している大門教を倒せるのは\n
おまえしか　おらん！！
column6: Brave Ziria! Only you can free Tsukuba from the Cult of Daimon!

column5: みんなのために戦って　くれい
column6: Please, fight for the sake of the people!

column5:
ホッホッホッ　そうか\n
わしは　おまえを　信じるそ！\n
この　あおいの剣を　つかわす
column6:
Hoh hoh hoh! I knew I could trust you!\n
Here, take the Aoi Sword with you!

column5: －　経験値＊＊＊をえた　－
column6: Received *** Virtue.

column5:
残念じゃ　この橋を　渡すことは\n
できんでな！　ゆるせよ！
column6: I'm sorry! You cannot cross the bridge!

column5:
大門教の　力が　強くなり\n
みんなが　苦しむことに　なる\n
行け！　ジライア！！
column6: The stronger the Cult of Daimon becomes, the more the common folk will suffer! Go forth, Ziria!

column5: ト伝道場
column6: Bokuden Dojo

column5:
わしが　剣の名人　ボクデンじゃ！\n
みごと　たおせれば　ものすごい\n
必殺剣を　おしえるが　かかってくるか？
column6:
I am Bokuden, master fencer!\n
Defeat me, and I'll teach you my special technique! Are you ready?

column5: うむ！
column6: Good!

column5: さて　あなたは勝ちましたか？
column6: Now then, can you beat me?

column5:
ええい！こしぬけめ！！\n
さっさと　かえれ！
column6:
Tch! Coward!\n
Get out of my sight!

column5:
うむ！　みごとじゃ！\n
１回目の　こうげきが　つよくなる\n
必殺剣　一の太刀を　さずける！
column6: Well done! I will teach you my Hitotsu no tachi, which increases the strength of your first strike!
column7: ZenkiTN: "Hitotsu no tachi" was the name of a technique invented by Bokuden historically... Not that it matters now.

column5:
ダメか　わしの　必殺剣を\n
おぼえて　くれる　ヤツは\n
おらぬかの　かなしい・・・
column6: No good! Will I ever find someone worthy of learning my special technique?

column5:
ジライアよ！\n
わしは　よい　デシを　もった\n
さあ　行くのじゃ！
column6:
You are a worthy pupil, Ziria!\n
Go forth, young hero!

column5: 盗人村
column6: Thief Village

column5:
ここが　盗人村ですよ　ジライアさん！\n
つちうら城の　なかまから\n
しらせが　入っています　ごゆっくり
column6:
Welcome to the Thief Village, Ziria!\n
Our comrade in Tsuchiura Castle told us about you. Make yourself at home!

column5:
ガマ仙人さんとこの　人なんだってね\n
大門教に　ジャマされて　困っているんだ\n
忍術で　チョイチョイって　やっつけてよ
column6:
You're the kid raised by the Toad Hermit, right?
#BOXPAUSE()
Those Daimonists are a real bother. Use your ninjutsu to deal with them, already.

column5:
東に　行くと　かしま村だ\n
あそこの　神獣を　大門教が\n
ねらっていたが　どうなったか
column6: Head east and you'll reach Kashima Village. I heard the Daimonists were targeting the divine beast.

column5:
盗人ってのは　ゴートーじゃねえ！\n
世の中の　カネを　ヘーキンに\n
ばらまく　だいじな　仕事だ！
column6: We thieves aren't bad guys! We're spreading wealth all over the world! It's a very important job!

column5:
ふるい盗人伝説によると\n
バカな人間はスグにカネを　ため込んで\n
オニになってしまう　これはコワイ！！
column6: According to old thieves' tales, fools who gather too much money turn into demons. Isn't that scary?

column5:
そこで神様が金を世の中ぜんたいに\n
ばらまくために　盗人をつくったんじゃ\n
ムニュ　ムニュ
column6: So God created us thieves to spread wealth from one pocket to many.

column5:
盗人村は　全国チェーンです\n
安心して　ご利用　ください
column6: The Thief Village is a nation-wide organization. Feel free to use our services!

column5:
大門教の　やつらは　オレたちが\n
カネを　ばらまくから\n
ジャマなんだ！　くやしいぜ！
column6: The Cult of Daimon is stopping us from spreading the wealth! They're so annoying!

column5:
大門教は　人々の不幸に\n
つけこんどる　だから　カネを\n
ばらまかれると　困るんじゃな
column6: The Cult of Daimon takes advantage of people's misfortune. That's why they don't want us spreading the wealth.

column5: 盗人宿
column6: Kumogiri Inn

column5:
とまると　すべて　宿帳に　きろく\n
されますぜ！
column6: I'll write your name in the inn's register!

column5:
ようこそ　おとまりは　＊＊両です\n
よろしいですか？
column6:
Welcome! It's 両** for the night.\n
Will you stay?

column5:
では　宿帳に　きろくいたします\n
どうぞ　ごゆっくり
column6:
I'll register you in the guest book.\n
Have a nice stay.

column5: また　どうぞ
column6: See you soon.

column5:
がんばって　くださいよ！\n
ジライアさん！！
column6: Hang in there, Ziria-san!

column5: よろず屋
column6: General Store

column5: いらっしゃい
column6: Welcome.

column5: ありがとうございます
column6: Thank you very much.

column5: 少しは遊んだほうがいいよ！ボク！
column6: It's okay to stop and relax from time to time!

column5: 鹿島神社
column6: Kashima Shrine

column5:
白いシカの　神社で　ゆうめいな\n
かしま村へ　ようこそ\n
でも　白いシカは・・・　シクシク
column6: Welcome to Kashima Village, home of the sacred White Deer. Unfortunately, our beloved guardian is...Sob, sob...

column5:
グスン　グスン\n
白いシカは　大門教に　封印され\n
石に　されたんだ
column6: Sniff...The Cult of Daimon sealed our sacred White Deer inside a boulder.

column5:
まったく　ひどい　ことです！\n
村の　守り神を　石にするなんて\n
みんな　かなしんで　いるのです
column6: How could they be so evil?! This is the saddest time for our village!

column5:
近ごろ　タヌキの　ワルさが　ひどい\n
白いシカが　いなくなったからに\n
ちがいないのじゃ　あああ
column6: The tanuki are causing more and more trouble. It must be because the White Deer is no longer protecting us...

column5:
北の　洞くつを　ぬけると\n
いばらき村へ　行けるけど
column6: Go through the cave up north and you'll reach Ibaraki Village.

column5:
北の　洞くつには　大タヌキが　出るぞ\n
あいつ　大門教の　手下なのさ\n
いっしょに　いるとこ　見たんだが
column6: But there is a large tanuki in the cave. He's a minion of the Cult of Daimon. I saw them together, you know.

column5:
村の　奥に　かしま神社が　あります\n
でも　悪いヤツが　ウロウロ\n
あぶないですよ
column6: The Kashima Shrine is in the back of the village, but the area is teeming with monsters.

column5:
白いシカが　いなくなってから\n
みんな　元気が　なくなったわ
column6: We're all feeling down since we lost the protection of the White Deer...

column5:
全国的に　大門教は\n
白い神様の動物がジャマで\n
石に封印しているらしい
column6:
It seems the Cult of Daimon is sealing the sacred white beasts of all Jipang inside boulders
#BOXPAUSE()
to stop them from interfering with their plans.

column5:
みんな　大門教が　悪いんだ！\n

He's not exactly priest material, you know? He eats meat and flirts with the ladies all the time.

ひでえよー！

なんとか　してくれぇー！

おヨメに　いけないよー！

column7: ZenkiTN: I think this is a reference to Dodes'ka-den, a 1970 movie by Akira Kurosawa based on the novel "The city without seasons" about a group of homeless people living in Tokyo (which used to be Edo). I'm not 100% sure, but I couldn't find anything else that was relevant.

信じすぎたからだ！

頭が　パーンして\n
はしゃぎすぎたのよ！

We shouldn't have partied like this!\n
We were too full of ourselves!

column5:

...This is hopeless...

column5:
なにも・・・・・\n
信じられない

column5:

バカヤロー！！

邪神斎さま！　なんとか\n

We were wrong!\n
Forgive us, Jashinsai-sama!\n
Please, give us our bodies back!

で・・・でも　イヤだヨー！\n
たすけてー！

ふわふわ　していて\n
きもちいいわ！

column5:

トホホホホホ・・・

ついてるんだ！　ジパングの　人が\n

なんとか　してくれぇー！

column5:
邪神斎の　魔術だ！\n
ナメとった　バツじゃ！
column6:
This is Jashinsai's magic!\n
He's punished us for making fun of him!

column5:
急に　まっくらに　なって\n
こんな　たましいに　されたわ！\n
おヨメに　いけないよー！
column6: Everything went dark, and now I'm just a spirit! How am I ever going to find a husband like this?!

column5:
どうしたことじゃ！\n
わしら　死んだのか・・・
column6: Wh-What happened?! Did we...die?

column5:
と・・・突然・・・\n
肉体が・・・\n
消滅した！
column6: All of a sudden, my body just...disappeared!

column5:
ウエーン！　まつりどころ　じゃねえ！\n
おらあ　どうすりゃいいんだ！
column6:
Bwaaah! This isn't funny!\n
What am I supposed to do?!

column5:
ひでえよー！\n
ひでえよー！
column6: This is horrible! Horrible!

column5:
ム・・・ムゴイ！！\n
けさ　目が　さめたら\n
こんな姿に・・・なさけない
column6:
This is too much...When I woke up this morning, I was in this state.\n
I feel miserable...

column5:
邪神斎の　ヤロー！！\n
あっついぜ！！\n
おれは　燃えてきたぜ！！
column6:
Damn that Jashinsai!\n
I'm burning with rage!\n
Grrr! I'm so fired up right now!

column5: 江戸城
column6: Edo Castle

column5:
ジライアよ！　最後の戦いの時がきた！\n
マサカドは　目の前だ！\n
負けることは　ゆるされないぞ！
column6:
Ziria! The time of the final battle is nigh! We're approaching Masakado...\n
and we cannot afford to lose!

column5:
おれたちの　力が　上か！\n
やつの　魔力が　上か！\n
決着をつけてやる！行こう！ジライア！
column6: Will we prove to be stronger? Or will his dark power prevail? It's time to find out! Onward, Ziria!

column5:
来たか　ジライア！！\n
火の一族よ！！\n
わしが　大門教総大将　邪神斎じゃ！！
column6:
Well met, Ziria...Well met, Fire Clan!\n
I am the supreme leader of the Cult of Daimon, Jashinsai!

column5:
わが　大門教は　このジパングに\n
あらたなる　楽園を　つくるための\n
希望の　宗教よぉ！！
column6: The Cult of Daimon is the only hope for Jipang to become a true paradise.

column5:
この国の　人々は　大門教のつくる\n
あたらしい　理想郷を　待っている！！\n
おまえは　それを　じゃまするのか？
column6:
The people of this country are waiting for us to create an ideal world...\n
And yet you wish to interfere.

column5:
ジライアよ！\n
最後の決着をつけようぞ！
column6: Ziria! I will grant you the confrontation you seek!

column5:
なつかしい　お前の友人たちも\n
おまえに　会いたいと言うので\n
わしが　呼び寄せておいたぞ！
column6: But first...Some of your old friends have been meaning to see you. Thus, I've decided to kindly summon them.

column5:
地下６階まで来い！\n
マサカドさまも　お待ちじゃ！！
column6:
Come to the sixth underground floor.\n
Masakado-sama is expecting you!\n
Bwahahahahaha!
column7: ZenkiTN: while it's not transcribed in Japanese, Jashinsai's audio has an evil cackle, so I've written it

column5: 江戸城
column6: Edo Castle

column5:
ジライア・・・\n
もう　いっしょに　戦えないよ・・・\n
ゴメンな
column6:
Ziria...I'm so sorry...\n
I can't fight with you anymore...
column7: ZenkiTN: so this is where Kogama went... avenge frog friend, Ziria!

column5:
ジライアだけが　たよりなんだよ・・・\n
ジパングを　救ってくれよ・・・\n
たのんだよ・・・　ジライア・・・
column6:
You gotta save Jipang...\n
You're our only hope now...\n
Ziria...

column5:
ジライアさまですね！　月姫です\n
大門教に　見つかり　父上と　ともに\n
このような　はずかしめを・・・
column6:
Ziria-sama! It's me, Tsukihime!\n
I was captured by the Cult of Daimon and put on display alongside my father...

column5:
ジライアさま！　父上は　大門教に\n
だまされていたのです\n
父は　ジパングを　愛しています
column6: Ziria-sama! My father was deceived by the Daimonists. He does love Jipang, truly.

column5:
民を　思うあまりに\n
平和を　願うあまり\n
大門教に　だまされて　しまったのです
column6: They deceived him, because he cared so much for the people. They deceived him, because he wished so much for peace.

column5:
ジライアさま！　どうか　父を\n
おゆるしください！　そして\n
この国の　人々を　お助けください！！
column6: I beg of you, Ziria-sama! Forgive my father! Please, save the people of our country!

column5:
おお！　おぬしが　勇者ジライアか！\n
わしは　江戸のショーグンじゃ
column6:
Ah...You must be the brave Ziria!\n
I am the Shogun of Edo.

column5:
わしは　だまされておった・・この国を\n
理想郷に　するという　大門教の話を\n
うのみに　してしまったのじゃ
column6:
I was deceived by the Cult of Daimon...\n
I believed them when they told me they could turn Jipang into a promised land.

column5:
やつらの　ほんとうの　正体を\n
知ったときには　もう　おそかった\n
わしらでは　たちうち　できなかった！
column6:
By the time I realized the truth about them, it was too late...\n
I was no longer able to stop them.

column5:
このままでは　みどりは　荒らされ\n
民の　心は　すさみ\n
ジパングは　滅びてしまうだろう！！
column6: At this rate, all nature will wither, all life will die out...Jipang will be annihilated!

column5:
勇者たちよ！　マサカドを　眠らせよ！\n
悪霊の　思うがままに　させてはならぬ\n
この　美しい国を　破壊させてはならぬ
column6:
Brave heroes! You must put Masakado to rest! Let not the evil achieve its ends!\n
Let not this beautiful country be ruined!

column5:
だれだ・・・・・・\n
だれか　おるのか・・・・・・・
column6:
Who...\n
Who is there...?

column5:
わしは　筑波山の　ガマ仙人じゃ\n
ふかくにも　大門教に　つかまり\n
生きたまま　カベに　埋められたのじゃ
column6: I am the Toad Hermit of Mount Tsukuba...Alas, I was captured by the Cult of Daimon, and buried alive inside this wall...

column5:
ああ・・・　何も　見えぬ・・・\n
何も　きこえぬ・・・\n
そこに　おるのは　だれなのじゃ・・・
column6:
I can no longer see...nor can I hear...\n
Is someone there...?

column5:
ジライアか・・・　雲切だよ\n
ガマ仙人が　大門教に　おそわれたって\n
きいてよ　助けに　行ったんだけどな
column6: That you, Ziria...? It's me, Kumogiri. When I heard the Daimonists were attacking the Toad Hermit, we rushed to save him.

column5:
大門教は　強かったぜ・・・\n
子分も　みんな　殺されちまった・・\n
ガマ仙人も　助けられなかった
column6:
But...They were too strong.\n
My boys were all killed...and I couldn't even save the Toad Hermit.

column5:
めんぼくねえ　ジライア\n
まったく　くやしいぜ・・・ちくしょう
column6:
You must think I'm pathetic, Ziria...\n
How could I be such a weakling?\n
Damn it all...

column5:
オレは　どうなっても　いいからよ\n
ガマ仙人を　助けて　やってくれよ\n
たのむぜ　ジライア
column6:
Forget about me.\n
You have to save the Toad Hermit.\n
You're our only hope now, Ziria...

column5:
その声は　ジライアさんですね\n
ワタシです　ホテイ丸ですよ
column6:
This voice is Ziria-san...\n
It is me, Hoteimaru.

column5:
ワタシ　大門教のことに　クビを\n
つっこみ　すぎたみたいネ
column6: I poke nose too much in Cult of Daimon business.

column5:
いっぱい　いっぱい　ゴーモンされて\n
こんなところに　閉じ込められて\n
しまったヨ！
column6: They torture and torture, and then they imprison me here!

column5:
ジライアさん！\n
ここ　とても　くるしいヨ・・・\n
助けて　フレンド！
column6:
Ziria-san...I have much pain!\n
Save me, friend!
...Oooh...

column5: クッ・・・くそっ・・・
column6: D-Damn him...

column5:
た・・たすけて・・・\n
マ　マ　サカド　が　よみ　がえ・・た
column6:
H-Help us...\n
M-Masakado...has been revived...

column5:
邪・・・神・・・・斎に\n
　たま・・・　ふた・・つ\n
・・城　の・・・なかに・・・
column6:
J-Jashinsai...\n
has hidden the orbs...\n
in the castle...

column5:
魔力・・で\n
カベに・・・うめられた・・
column6: We were buried in this wall...with magic...

column5:
こうして　たましいを・・・\n
・・・ぬかれる・・だ・・・
column6: My soul is...slipping...away...

column5: 江戸城
column6: Edo Castle

column5: 江戸城
column6: Edo Castle

column5: つづらの中を　調べた
column6: You look inside the casket.

column5: 中には　なにも入っていなかった
column6: But there is nothing inside.

column5: 江戸城
column6: Edo Castle

column5: 江戸城
column6: Edo Castle

column5: つづらの中を　調べた
column6: You look inside the casket.

column5: 中には　なにも入っていなかった
column6: But there is nothing inside.

column5:
中には　なにも入っていなかった\n
・・・・？？
column6:
There is nothing inside...\n
...Huh?

column5: 階段が現れた
column6: A staircase appears out of nowhere.

column5: 江戸城
column6: Edo Castle

column5: つづらの中を　調べた
column6: You look inside the casket.

column5: 中には　なにも入っていなかった
column6: But there is nothing inside.

column5: しゅりけんがあった
column6: You find a shuriken.

column5: 白キジの尾があった
column6: You find a White Pheasant tail.

column5: ガマの油があった
column6: You find toad oil.

column5: 神丹があった
column6: You find a God elixir.

column5: 白ガマの油があった
column6: You find White Toad oil.

column5: 月寝の粉があった
column6: You find Tsukine powder.

column5: 白ガマの油があった
column6: You find White Toad oil.

column5: 夕なぎの剣があった
column6: You find the Yuunagi sword.

column5: ガマの油があった
column6: You find toad oil.

column5: オロチ丸の　ヘビ玉を　見つけた
column6: You find Orochimaru's Snake Orb.

column5: 中から　まばゆい光が　あふれだした
column6: A dazzling light comes pouring out!

column5: ヘビ玉を　取り返した！！\n
column6: You have retrieved the legendary Snake Orb!

column5: どくけしがあった
column6: You find an antidote.

column5: 江戸城
column6: Edo Castle

column5: つづらの中を　調べた
column6: You look inside the casket.

column5: 中には　なにも入っていなかった
column6: But there is nothing inside.

column5: 中から　まばゆい光が　あふれだした
column6: A dazzling light comes pouring out!

column5: ツナデの　ナメクジ玉を　見つけた
column6: You find Tsunade's Slug Orb.

column5: ナメクジ玉を　取り返した！！\n
column6: You have retrieved the legendary Slug Orb!

column5: ツノかぶとを見つけた
column6: You find a spiked helmet.

column5: 江戸城
column6: Edo Castle

column5: つづらの中を　調べた
column6: You look inside the casket.

column5: 中には　なにも入っていなかった
column6: But there is nothing inside.

column5: 神通力の玉があった
column6: You find a supernatural orb.

column5: 江戸城
column6: Edo Castle

column5: つづらの中を　調べた
column6: You look inside the casket.

column5: 中には　なにも入っていなかった
column6: But there is nothing inside.

column5: 神丹があった
column6: You find a God elixir.

column5: 仙丹があった
column6: You find an elixir.

column5: 白ガマの油があった
column6: You find White Toad oil.

column5:
うう〜　苦しいよ〜\n
はやく　楽にしてくれ〜
column6:
Urgh...I'm suffering...\n
Please, deliver me from this pain...

column5:
死ぬほど　拷問されてよ\n
恐怖が　絶頂になった　しゅんかんに\n
たましいを　引きぬかれた！
column6:
I was tortured to death...\n
The moment your fear is at its peak, you lose your soul!

column5:
人の　恨みや　憎しみの　こもった\n
たましいほど　マサカドは\n
よろこぶって　いうんだ
column6: Masakado delights in souls filled with regret and hatred...

column5:
ここにいる　たましいは　みんな\n
マサカドに　喰われちまうんだ\n
つぎは　おれの番かもしれない
column6: Masakado consumes the souls that end up here...It could be my turn next...

column5:
はやく　わたしたちを\n
もとの姿に　もどしてください！
column6: Please, return us to our bodies!

column5: 江戸城
column6: Edo Castle

column5: 江戸城
column6: Edo Castle

column5: 盗人訓練所
column6: Thieving School

column5:
ここは　大門教を　やっつけるために\n
ぬすっとを　養成する\n
通称　ぬすっと訓練所です！！
column6: This is a Thieving School, where you can improve your thievery in order to help defeat the Cult of Daimon!

column5:
奥の　部屋に　入って\n
教官を　よけて\n
つづらの中の　お金を　とるんです！
column6: Head inside, avoid the instructors, and steal the money from the casket!

column5:
みごと　お金を　とることに\n
成功したら\n
そのお金は　あなたのものです！
column6: If you can steal the money successfully, you get to keep it for yourself!

column5:
まあ　遊びだと　おもって\n
気軽に　たのしんでくださいよ！\n
だけど　マサカド打倒も　お忘れなく！
column6:
Think of it as a game and have fun!\n
But don't forget your quest to defeat Masakado!

column5: 歌舞伎場
column6: Kabuki Theater

column5:
今　大人気の　ジライアが\n
カブキになって　登場だ！！\n
これを見逃す手はないよ！！
column6: Today, we're having a show about the popular Ziria! You don't want to miss it!

column5:
見なきゃ　一生の損ってもんだ\n
さあさあ\n
お代は　みての　お帰りだよ
column6: Come on in! And if you enjoyed the show, please leave a donation on your way out!

column5:
よっ！　兄さん！\n
どうだったい？　よかっただろ！
column6:
Did you enjoy the show?\n
It was great, wasn't it?

column5:
次の上演まで　しばらくかかるから\n
他でも　見物しといで
column6: It'll be a while before the next show, so check out the rest of the festival!

column5:
おや　兄さんがた！！\n
ジライアたちとそっくり！！\n
イキだね！　イナセだね！
column6: Oh, wow! You look just like Ziria and his friends! You've got all the details right, even the mannerisms!

column5: でも　本物には負けるよね
column6: But you're not a patch on the real deal. Hahaha!

column5: 飛田
column6: Tobita
column7: NOTE: names for dev room easter egg (cf. credits)

column5: 三上
column6: Mikami

column5: 菊池
column6: Kikuchi

column5: 中田
column6: Nakata

column5: 進藤
column6: Shindo

column5: 藤本
column6: Fujimoto

column5: 佐藤
column6: Sato

column5: 福田
column6: Fukuda

column5: 久保
column6: Kubo

column5: 桑原
column6: Kuwabara

column5: 岡田
column6: Okada

column5: 武田
column6: Takeda

column5: 山森
column6: Yamamori

column5: 開演！！
column6: Showtime!

column5: 火消し屋
column6: Fire Station

column5:
ここでは　地震を\n
体験することができます\n
ぜひ　試してみて　ください
column6: This room has been created to provide the experience of an earthquake.

column5:
次の　三つの中から\n
お好みの地震を　お選びください
column6: Please select the type of earthquake you wish to experience.

column5:
弱震\n
強震\n
激震
column6:
Mild\n
Severe\n
Extreme

column5:
お疲れさま　でした！！\n
もし　本当に　地震が　きたら\n
あわてず　まず　火の点検です！
column6:
What did you think?\n
Remember, in the event of an earthquake, always check for fires in the area!

column5:
ジライア！\n
はしごが　あんなところに\n
落ちたわよ・・・　ふしぜんね！
column6: Ziria! How'd the ladder fall all the way over there...? Wacky!

column5:
えっ？　またやるんですか？\n
準備に　時間が　かかるので\n
他のところへ　行かれては・・・
column6: Err, you want to do it again? It'll take a while to set things back up...Why don't you check out somewhere else first?

column5:
オー！まいフレンド！　ジライアさん！\n
ケンカと地震は　江戸のフラワー！！\n
なにか　ちがいましたデスカ？
column6:
Oh, my friend! Ziria-san!\n
Fight and earthquake are flower of Edo!\n
Huh? I say wrong?
column7:
CHECK, Hoteimaru's accent
ZenkiTN: this is a reference to an old Japanese saying, 火事と喧嘩は江戸の花 (Fires and fights are the flowers of Edo)

column5:
少しデモ　ジパングの　人の\n
役に立てれば\n
思いました　デスヨ！
column6: I want to help people of Jipang, even little bit!

column5:
それで　火消しマンと　相談して\n
地震たいけんルームと　いう\n
カラクリ　作ってみました　デス
column6: So I talk to fireman and make mechanic earthquake experience room!

column5:
あっ　ここは\n
関係者以外　立入禁止なんですよ\n
まいったな！　秘密にしてたのになあ
column6: Sir! This area is for authorized personnel only!...Oh, you got me. I was trying to keep this a secret.

column5:
じつは　火消し仲間と　話をしていたら\n
マサカドが　復活したら　食いモンも\n
なくなるんじゃ　ねぇかって　ことで
column6: You see, me and the boys had a talk about what we'd do if Masakado comes back. Like, what are we going to eat?

column5:
キノコなんすけどね！　栽培してるんだ\n
そしたら　へんな　キノコが\n
できちゃいましてね
column6:
So we came up with a solution:\n
Mushrooms! We started growing them, but our mushrooms came out a little weird.

column5:
いやあ　話して　いいのかなあ？\n
幻覚　見ちゃうんですよ！　ゲンカク！\n
死んじゃうようなことは　ないんですよ
column6:
Don't tell anyone, but...\n
They make you SEE things!\n
These shrooms are psychedelic, maaan!

column5:
どうです\n
ひとつ　ジライアさんも\n
召し上がりやすか？
column6:
How about it, Ziria-san?\n
Wanna try some?

column5:
ジライアたちは\n
キノコを　食べた
column6: Ziria's party ate the mushrooms.

column5:
そのほうが　イイですよ\n
あっしも　このキノコの　おかげで\n
この部屋の　出口を　忘れちまった！！
column6: Yeah, that's for the best. I can't even remember how to leave this room, maaan!

column5: 飛脚屋
column6: Post Office

column5:
ここは　ヒキャク屋です\n
全国から　手紙が　あつまる所です
column6: This is the post office. Letters from all over Jipang gather here before being delivered.

column5:
ジライアさんにも　\n
手紙が　届いていますよ\n
ハイ　どうぞ！！
column6: Ziria-san? Why, yes, there's a letter for you. Here you go!

column5:
ジライア殿　生きとるか？\n
　　　　ホッホッホッ・・・・\n
　　　ワシじゃ　黄門じゃよ！！
column6:
[space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px]How are you doing, Ziria-dono?\n
[space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px]Hoh hoh hoh!\n
[space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px]It is I, Koumon!
column7: ZenkiTN: Koumon literally went "LOL" on his Edo-era letter

column5:
ジライア殿の　かつやくぶりは\n
　　　　　この　水戸城まで\n
　　　　　伝わっておるぞ
column6:
[space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px]Word of your exceptional\n
[space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px]deeds has reached even\n
[space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px]Mito Castle.

column5:
ジライア殿の　おかげで\n
　　　　この　筑波国は\n
　　　　すっかり　平和じゃ
column6:
[space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px]Thanks to you,\n
[space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px]the lands of Tsukuba\n
[space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px]have reclaimed peace.

column5:
敵は　あと　ひとりじゃ\n
　　　おそれることは　ない
column6:
[space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px]There is but a\n
[space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px]single foe remaining.\n
[space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px]You have nothing to fear.

column5:
水戸城の　空の下から\n
　　　　ぶじを　祈っておるぞ
column6:
[space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px]As I look upon the sky\n
[space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px]above Mito Castle, I will\n
[space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px]pray for your safety.

column5:
行け　ジライア！\n
　　　　エイ　エイ　オー！
column6:
[space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px]Go forth, Ziria!\n
[space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px][space8px]Hip, hip, hooray!

column5:
ジライア殿へ\n
\n
　　　　　　黄　門より
column6:
